title: Amazing turkish delights
text:
Every time i visit istanbul i should visit this place
They the most delicious and amazing turkish delights.
Highly recommended

title: Simply amazing
text:
Visited this place is a must when you are in Istanbul
Very tasty Tantouni sandwich
Simply this place is amazing and highly recommended

title: Very good fish
text:
While walking in Karakoy we visited this place for lunch
Amazing view
Friendly waiters
Very tasty fish and shrimps
I recommend this restaurant

title: Average shisha
text:
Visited this place for shisha with my friends
The hostess is not friendly at all
The waiter is friendly and always smiling
They dont have disposable shisha hose
The shisha looks nice but very bad taste and not worth the cost
I dont recommend and definitely I will not visit this place again

title: Just amazing
text:
Visited this restaurant for the first time after reservation over the phone
Amazing view
Very tasty food
Simply amazinggggg
Highly recommended

title: Istanbul Visit
text:
Visited istanbul with friends
Its not the first time we visit Faros
Very Good restaurant
Waiters very friendly
Very tasty food
Simply this restaurant is highly recommended

title: Amazing place and food
text: Visited with friends for lunch. Very tasty food. Professional waiters always smiling and very helpful. Food is amazing. Highly recommended

title: Very nice place
text: Went with my friends for a coffee. Very cute place. Tasty coffee. Smiling professional waiter. Highly recommended

title: Highly recommended restaurant in Nice
text: Visited this place with my friends for a dinner. We tried salad pizza and pasta. Food is really amazing. And the restaurant is highly recommended

title: Beat food
text: Visiting this place for a dinner in one night in Rome. Waiter is professional. Place is very nice and cozy. Food is amazing. Highly recommended

title: Best Pizza
text: Visited this place with a friend for dinner. Waiters are always smiling and professional. Food amazing we ordered 2 Pizzas and 1 Focaccia. Price are affordable. Highly recommended

title: Best Dinner
text: Visited this place with my friends for a dinner. The staff are all very friendly. Waiter Joe always smiling and very professional. Food is amazing. Desert is really wow especially Molten chocolate and pain perdu. Highly recommended

title: Very nice place
text: Visited this place for a cappuccino. Very professional and friendly waiter. Tasty coffee. Nice location. Highly recommended

title: Amazing Hotel and service
text:
Visited Amsterdam for a friend Birthday and we have chosen the Hendrick’s hotel based on reviews on TripAdvisor
The hotel was excellent
The room was perfect, the staff very friendly, the hotel is clean and easily accessible
They have an employee called Meedo responsible of the breakfast: he is very friendly, professional and always smiling

This hotel is highly recommended

title: Nice Shisha lounge
text:
Visited this place for shisha with my friends
Staff very friendly
Nice shisha
Very tasty morrocan tea
Highly recommended

title: Amazing experience
text:
Visited this place with my friends
Very friendly staff
Price per person 21€
We had a very nice experience
Highly recommended when Visiting Amsterdam

title: Tasty Breakfast
text:
Visited this place for breakfast
Very friendly and professional staff
Very tasty food
Affordable price
Highly recommended

title: Clean and nice hotel
text: Stayed in the hotel for 2 nights for my university visit in Nice. The hotel is very clean. Easy accessible. 10 mns walk frok Massena Square. Very clean rooms. Tasty breakfast. Friendly and professional staff. I have to visit Nice every month and i will check the rates and choose Hotel Vendome again. Its highly recommended

title: Great place for Shisha in Nice
text: Visited this place for arguile shisha. The place is very nice. Friendly and very polite staff. Visited twice during my stay in Nice. The shisha is 15euros (very affordable). Will visit again. Highly recommended

title: Nice place
text: Visited this place in November for a business trip in Nice. Very nice place its a must when visiting the wonderful city Nice

title: Tasty Burger
text: Visited this place for lunch. I had a burger and fries. Very tasty. The place is very nice decorated. The staff all friendly. Highly recommended

title: Nice café
text: Always visiting this place for shisha lunch and dinner. Very tasty food. Very nice staff (Mohamad Ali) always smiling and professional. The place is highly recommended

title: Amazing place
text: Visited in October with family and friends. Very nice place. Very lively always. Safe place and nice encounter. Nice restaurants and cafés

title: Very nice
text: Visited in October with family and friends. We visited the acropolis for the second time very nice organized historical place

title: Very nice hotel. Friendly staff
text: Visited the hotel in October for the second time. Very clean hotel. Staff are all friendly very helpful and very professional. Breakfast is very tasty and we had many choices. Rooms are clean and well organized. We asked for a cake to celebrate 2 friends birthday, the hotel presented the cake on the house and it was very kind from them. Simply this hotel is Highly recommended

title: Visited this restaurant with family
text:
Visited this restaurant with family in a trip to Athens
Very good restaurant
Very tasty
Good service
Highly recommended

title: Amazing Chicha
text: Visited this place for a chicha with friends. Very nice street. Very lively. Waiters all nice. Shisha for 15 euros all flavors. Highly recommended

title: Nice place
text: Visited this place for a dinner with 4 friends. Waiters are very professional and always smiling. Nice view on Champs Elysées. Very tasty food and affordable price. Highly recommended

title: Bon café
text:
Visited with friends for a morning coffee
Waiter is very friendly
Delicious coffee
Nice place
Highly recommended

title: Medium
text: We visited Ahwak Broumana branch. The staff are all friendly and the waiter was very professional and always smiling. The food wasnt wow. We ordered Fatoush was perfect. Shaknlish not tasty. Batata harra not tasty at all. Baby chicken not bad

title: Very nice food
text: We have visited Duo ABC Verdun. Very friendly staff. Very nice ambiance. Food was amazing. Very tasty salad bar. We ordered vegetarian Pizza and sushi. Highly recommended

title: Good food
text: Visited Crepaway in city center for a dinner. Very friendly hostess. Professional waiter. Very tasty food. Recommended

title: Amazing Ambiance
text:
I visited this place for desert and coffee.
Very nice location. Very tasty ice cream. Friendly staff. Highly recommended

title: Best Burger and milk shake
text:
Visiting this place is a must when visiting paris. Best burger ever. Very tasty milkshakes (mix of Vanilla strawberry and chocolate)
Highly recommended

title: Simply amazing
text: Visiting the Eiffel Tower is a must when visiting the wonderful city: Paris. Amazing place. Fabulous sculpture

title: Very bad experience
text:
I visited this place for dinner (shawarma sandwiches)
The guy on cash is very rude and impolite, and i wasn’t the only one saying this in the restaurant
The quality of food is bad and the prices are expensive for such sandwiches
Not recommended at all

title: Amazing boat trip
text:
Exploring the bateaux parisiens for the second time.
Easy access
Easy way to reserve online
Boat is clean
The informations are in many languages and very helpful

title: Very good service
text:
Visiting the hotel for the second time.
Very good location
Very friendly and professional staff
Very clean rooms
Reception team are always smiling and helpful
Breakfast is good
Simply the hotel is highly recommended

title: Very tasty 2000 feuille
text: Visiting this place is a must while passing in Champs elysees. Simply best location. Best desert best service

title: Very good cafe
text: Very good place for shisha. Good music and very friendly staff. Well recommended place in Paris for shisha

title: Good cafe
text: I was there with a friend for a coffee. The waiter was very friendly and always smiling. The coffee well presented and nice taste. Recommended place

title: Amazing food and service
text: I went with a friend for lunch. We ordered salad pizza and pasta. All was amazing. Good taste. Very helpful and friendly staff. Highly recommended

title: Very good breakfast
text: We visited Bartartine Zeitouna bay for a sunday breakfast. Very tasty food. Good service. Nice view. Clean tables and area. Highly recommended

title: Good place
text:
We have visited the place for the first time this year
Nice place. Very nice music. Staff was amazing specially the waiter called Habib. They have shisha on the pool so its is great
Just one thing i dont like is the reception girl she is very rude and they search all over your bag

title: Best piazza
text: Visited for the third time. Very lively place with a lot of culture and positive vibes. When visited Milan this place is a must

title: Best place
text: Its my 3rd time at Luini. Best traditional italian bread and pizza. If you are visiting Milano i think its a must. Highly recommended

title: Wow place
text: Visited for the third time. Its a must when visited Milano. Many shops and very nice ambiance inside. Highly recommended

title: Amazing place and food
text: We visited this place on our trip to Milano. Amazing food: we ordered Salmon salad, Bruschetta salmon, pasta with Mushroom, lasagne with pesto and Risotto sea food and all were wonderful. The waiter was very nice with us. The price is fair according to the food quality

title: Amazing place
text: Its my second time in Milano. The Duomo is a fabulous place. Always have a lot of tourists. Highly recommended

title: Amazing food
text: Amazing place. Very good service and friendly staff. We ordered starters and pasta, both were very tasty. Highly recommended

title: Amazing Bistrot
text: Amazing food. Very good service. Nice presentation. Friendly staff. We ordered 6 to 7 different plates and all was excellent. Highly recommended

title: Nice cruise
text: Visited Ayia Napa in April. We tried this cruise. Really amazing. Captain is so friendly. Amazing food on board. Highly recommended

title: Nice place
text: Very nice place. Very clean. Friendly staff. Amazing food and drinks its highly recommended when visited Ayia Napa

title: Amazing Italian food
text: Visited the place for a dinner. Ordered 2 pizzas. Amazing taste. Good service. Affordable price. Highly recommended

title: Amazing show
text: Visited the place for the first time. Amazing ambiance. Amazing show. Professional dancers. We really enjoyed the show

title: Amazing Steak
text: Visited this place with my friends on March 2019. Good service. Amazing steak and very tasty desert. Highly recommended

title: Amazing food and service
text: I visited the restaurant for a lunch. I liked the employees service and reception. The food was amazing. Very good shisha. Highly recommended

title: Amazing Stay
text: We visit paris several time per year and we used to have an hotel in Champs Elysées. We Visited this hotel last week and it Was a wonderful stay. Very professional and friendly staff. Very clean hotel. Location is perfect. Rooms are spacious with clean beds and clean towels everyday. The reception staff received us very well. Always smiling and really very polite. Thank you Oceanic hotel and definitely will come back

title: Amazing Hot Chocolate
text: We have visited this place on March 2019 after several recommendations from friends. Its an amazing place with a very tasty hot chocolate. Its a must in Madrid. Highly recommended

title: Amazing place
text: We visited this place on March 2019. Amazing palace. Easy access. Friendly people. I really enjoyed my visit
